name: REM
description:
REM is the story of a child exploring his own imagination through dreams... if only he knew it. Explore this brief and challenging platforming demo, avoiding and battling nightmare creatures, and collecting Zs to further your progress through dream doors.

CONTROLS:

Up, Down, Left, Right to move

Up to enter doors

Hold "S" to run

Hold "S" when touching a block to pick it up, release "S" to let go

"S" to shoot (when able)

"D" to jump (also double jump or wall jump when able)

"C" to pause and unpause

"X" to restart area

(This is more of a proof of concept really, a test play of a larger concept. Feedback and support is appreciated, and a full version is in the works!)
